tool_description: The "Everybody Hates Chris API" is a versatile and entertaining application programming interface (API) designed to provide users with a unique and enjoyable experience centered around the popular television series "Everybody Hates Chris." This API serves as a gateway to a treasure trove of information, trivia, and quotes from the show, allowing developers and fans to integrate its features into their own projects or simply relish in the nostalgia of the beloved sitcom.
name: Everybody Hates Chris
title: Everybody Hates Chris

api_list.name: GET /api/v1/series/evhc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://everybody-hates-chris.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "everybody-hates-chris.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET /charname/:character
api_list.description: Retorna uma lista através do nome ficticio “Chris Rock” com todas as informações referente ao ator.

api_list.name: GET /originalname/:original_name
api_list.description: Retorna uma lista através do nome original “Tayler James Williams” com todas as informações referente ao ator.
